name: Poobird
description:
Poop with space.

Move with -a and -d or left and right arrow key.

Speed up or slow down with -w and -s or up and down  arrow key.

Poop as many cars as you can, without being shot by those filthy hunters :)

Also, I'd like to continue the game, by adding more levels and stuff. So if you have any suggestions, I'd love to hear them, as well as some feedback :)
